remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法和至少一个传递的参数不符合所调用的方法的参数规范时引发。 is thrown when a method is invoked and at least one of the passed arguments does not meet the parameter specification of the called method. 属性标识无效自变量。The property identifies the invalid argument. 大多数情况下，引发由公共语言运行时或另一个类库，并指示开发人员错误。Most commonly, an is thrown by the common language runtime or another class library and indicates developer error. 如果引发在代码中，您应该确保异常的属性包括描述无效自变量和参数值的预期的范围的有意义的错误消息。If you throw an from your code, you should ensure that the exception's property includes a meaningful error message that describes the invalid argument and the expected range of values for the argument. 主派生的类都和。The primary derived classes of are and . 这些派生的类应使用而不是，除非在派生类都不是可接受的情况下。These derived classes should be used instead of , except in situations where neither of the derived classes is acceptable. 例如，应通过引发异常：For example, exceptions should be thrown by: - 每当`null`传递给不接受它作为有效参数的方法。 whenever `null` is passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument. - 自变量的值时的可接受的值; 范围之外例如，当"46"的值作为月参数传递的创建过程。 when the value of an argument is outside the range of acceptable values; for example, when the value "46" is passed as the month argument during the creation of a . 如果方法调用不具有任何参数或失败不涉及参数本身，然后应使用。If the method call does not have any argument or if the failure does not involve the arguments themselves, then should be used. 使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何引发和捕获。The following example demonstrates how to throw and catch an . 它使用[ArgumentException.GetType()。名称](xref:System.Type.Name%2A)属性来显示的异常对象，还使用名称属性来显示异常消息的文本。It uses the [ArgumentException.GetType().Name](xref:System.Type.Name%2A) property to display the name of the exception object, and also uses the property to display the text of the exception message.
